meanings.definition: To have received a lesson or instruction.
meanings.sent1: She lessoned her students on the importance of kindness.
meanings.sent2: The students lessoned about the solar system in science class.
meanings.sent3: The cat lessoned the kitten on how to catch a mouse.
meanings.sent4: The wise old owl lessoned the young birds on the ways of the forest.
meanings.sent5: The chef lessoned the new cook on how to make the perfect souffle.

meanings.definition: To have been taught a lesson or moral.
meanings.sent1: He lessoned his brother about the consequences of lying.
meanings.sent2: The character in the story lessoned about honesty and integrity.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel lessoned about the dangers of stealing nuts.
meanings.sent4: The protagonist lessoned about the value of friendship through his journey.
meanings.sent5: The child lessoned about responsibility after taking care of the family pet.

meanings.definition: To have reduced in intensity or severity.
meanings.sent1: The storm lessoned in strength as it moved away.
meanings.sent2: The pain in her arm lessoned after applying ice.
meanings.sent3: The noise from the construction site lessoned as the workers took a break.
meanings.sent4: His anger lessoned when he realized the misunderstanding.
meanings.sent5: The tension in the room lessoned as everyone started laughing.
